description:
Kurt obtains the Dragon`s Flute and appears before Well and his comrades, planning to kill them. However, the magic item he obtained was actually the Flute of Malice, a cursed item which gathers malice and turns the user into an undead. After unwittingly living up to the expectations of those longed for Kurt to be overthrown, Well takes his greatest gamble yet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The 8th Son? I Guess That`s Not So Bad!
八男って, それもありでしょう!
